h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master
content: To free yourself, you'll need to use the Weaver's Needle Vessel. It will take a moment to work so be prepared to dodge his next attack while the needle begins to shoot all around him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master'.
The content is as follows:
To free yourself, you'll need to use the Weaver's Needle Vessel. It will take a moment to work so be prepared to dodge his next attack while the needle begins to shoot all around him.
